typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Age as string,
		Sex as string,
		ChestPainType as string,
		RestingBP as string,
		Cholesterol as string,
		FastingBS as string,
		RestingECG as string,
		MaxHR as string,
		ExerciseAngina as string,
		Oldpeak as string,
		ST_Slope as string,
		HeartDisease as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
